title: OmniFocus v4 Database Reverse Engineering
description: Fully reverse-engineer OmniFocus v4 database format (.ofocus bundle). Deliverables: 1) Complete format documentation (markdown), 2) Go library for reading, 3) Go library for writing, 4) Test/demo scripts, 5) Build system with single 'build' command. Success: User can test and demo in one run on clean machine.

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: CLI Tool and Test Scripts
description:
Create CLI tool and test/demo scripts for OmniFocus database operations.

CLI TOOL: cmd/ofocus

Commands:
- ofocus read <db.ofocus> - Parse and list all tasks
- ofocus export <db.ofocus> - Export to JSON
- ofocus create-task <db.ofocus> --name 'Task name' - Create new task
- ofocus validate <db.ofocus> - Validate database integrity

TEST SCRIPTS: scripts/
- test-read.sh - Demonstrate reading
- test-write.sh - Demonstrate writing
- demo.sh - Full demo for presentation

All scripts should work with testdata/OmniFocus.ofocus

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Go Library: OmniFocus Reader (ofocusread)
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement Go library for reading OmniFocus v4 .ofocus bundles.

PACKAGE: pkg/ofocus (or internal/ofocus)

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Parse bundle structure (load all transaction ZIPs in order)
2. Parse XML contents (namespace: http://www.omnigroup.com/namespace/OmniFocus/v2)
3. Reconstruct full database state from base + deltas
4. Export data model structs: Task, Context, Folder, Perspective, Attachment
5. Provide query API: ListTasks(), GetTask(id), ListFolders(), etc.
6. Handle content-addressed attachments (data/ directory)

TEST DATA: testdata/OmniFocus.ofocus (copy from /Users/mandrigin/Desktop/)

Write unit tests that validate reading the test database.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Go Library: OmniFocus Writer (ofocuswrite)
description:
Implement Go library for writing OmniFocus v4 .ofocus bundles.

PACKAGE: pkg/ofocus (extend reader package)

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Create new delta transaction ZIPs
2. Generate correct filename format (timestamp=hash1+hash2.zip)
3. Produce valid XML with correct namespace
4. Support operations: CreateTask, UpdateTask, DeleteTask, etc.
5. Maintain transaction chain integrity
6. Write content-addressed attachments to data/

DEPENDS ON: Reader library (shared data structures)

Write unit tests that create transactions and verify with reader.

title: Format Documentation: OmniFocus v4 .ofocus bundle specification
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write complete reverse-engineering documentation at /Users/mandrigin/Desktop/omnifocus-db.md

SCOPE:
1. Bundle structure (.ofocus directory layout)
2. Transaction chain (filename format: timestamp=hash1+hash2.zip)
3. XML schema (namespace, all element types)
4. Data model (task, context/tag, folder, project, perspective, attachment)
5. Delta operations (update, reference, delete)
6. Content-addressed data blobs (data/ directory)
7. Capability files (.capability plist format)

TEST DATA: /Users/mandrigin/gt/omnifocus/crew/mandrigin/testdata/OmniFocus.ofocus

Include examples from real data. Document all discovered fields.

title: Build System: Makefile with clean-machine build
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create build system that works on clean machine.

MAKEFILE targets:
- build: Compile all Go code
- test: Run all tests
- lint: Run linters
- demo: Run demo script
- clean: Remove build artifacts

REQUIREMENTS:
- Single 'make build' works on clean machine (only needs Go installed)
- Document Go version requirement in README
- Include .github/workflows/ci.yml for GitHub Actions
- CI gates: build must pass before MR merge

README.md updates:
- Quick start instructions
- Build requirements
- Demo instructions
